Reviews.Title: User-friendly design, great buy
Reviews.Author: Small-business owner "Small-business owner"
Reviews.Content: Wanting a point-and-shoot again, to occasionally replace my beloved but bulky bridge camera, I chose this one based on reviews on Best Buy. I love it! Very simple to set up and learn to use. No separate battery charger needed -- just connect the camera to an outlet, as you would a cell phone. The provided CD, with the user's manual,  isn't usable on a Mac, which is a strange state of affairs, but the manual is easy to find on line.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: i purchased this camera a couple of days ago at a nearby best buy, and i love it. The camera takes excellent pictures and it easy to use in normal situations, as well as easy to use in situations which require the use of the more advanced settings. I would recommend this camera to anybody who wants a good camera for everyday situations but the options and settings are not extensive enough for an avid photographer or extreme settings

Reviews.Title: Cute, fun and functional
Reviews.Author: A. Collins
Reviews.Content: I really love this little aqua-blue camera! The buttons are very user-friendly and it gives you lots of options. The pictures are clear and true. The only thing that is a problem, (and I hope someone might be able to help me on this),is that when I download the photos to my computer, they disappear from the camera! The manual does not say anything about this; and I cannot believe that you can lose your photos from the camera without wanting to. If this is the only way it works, then I see that as a drawback.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: sixties
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this camera. I didn't expect much of it and although it has very few flaws, it's still a really good camera, especially for the price. I recommend this to anyone looking for a cheap, easy to use, good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: Good, cheap camera
Reviews.Author: R. B. "R.B."
Reviews.Content: Good camera for everyday use at a cheap price.  It has many extras.  A simple "auto/smart" mode takes the guessing out of your hands but you can easily change settings.  Also, if you do not understand a setting, there is an easy tutorial in the camera itself.  It's a "help" option in the setting.  I got it for my parents whom are not tech capable but good for all levels of users.  Also, 12 MP is too large for them.  The photos take up alot of memory on your computer so it is nice to have an option that allows you to save it as a 3, 5, 8 MP.. so on.  5 to 8MP is plenty for them and with a 4gig  memory card, you can save 2000 + photos on the card.  Got it at Best Buy on sale for 69 bucks.  I only wish there was a view finder.  You can only use it with the screen in the back 2.7"  It's a good size and clear viewing.

Reviews.Title: PLZ GET IT
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for [...] at best buy and it was a great sale i was playing around with it and it take VERY CLEAR PICTURES i was very happy with it. A brand that you do not want to look in to is Vivitar it is the worse camera EVER!

Reviews.Title: Just right for me.
Reviews.Author: SelenaWalker
Reviews.Content: I really like the size, very little shutter lag, can imprint pictures with date, good color which sets it apart from other cameras, and good price.I would have liked an optical viewfinder and wish it used AA batteries, but at this price you can't easily find these features. I didn't like having to print the users manual (97 pages!) from the DVD that came with it.But overall, it's just right for me.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera!
Reviews.Author: myopinionistruth
Reviews.Content: I got this camera to take pictures of my newborn. I have had it now for 8 months and still love it. I have dropped it 3 times and it takes pictures the same way as before. I am able to zoom in and it doesn't blow the picture up so much that it is foggy. The image is always clear and when downloaded look even better. I bought this camera at 105 and was shocked with the price then. It does a lot, but I only use the auto feature. Great camera. Would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: New York Ellie
Reviews.Content: Have only taken a few pictures but what I have taken are sharp and clear.  Also did my own developing and pictures are fabulous. Although Samsung is not known for cameras, this is an excellent camera for the price.  On par with other better known camera companies.  Was also easy to learn how to operate.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Darque Rider
Reviews.Content: sorry to say it was dropped and broken within a week of purchase.  These things happen.  Granddaughter is moving up to the next level camera.

Reviews.Title: diceived !! sold me the product as new but it was VERY used
Reviews.Author: ANILKA DE LA CRUZ
Reviews.Content: It was sold to me as new and to my surprise it was not. Very disappointed at the seller. Did not return it, it went to waste. Camera had scratches on it. I though I had a deal but really they did with my money

Reviews.Title: A Great Camera
Reviews.Author: This Guy Says...
Reviews.Content: Before getting this camera, consider this:There are other colors availabeIt may or may not come with extra items (mine did!)Pointing it at the sun for extended period will damage the lenseThis camera makes a great gift for novice photographersIt can record video also, however the sound quality is poor, and muted when zoomingThis is the first camera I've ever purchased for myself, and as a gift.Great non-flash picture quality (flash usually = sharper image, but this camera does will with and without flash, at least mine did)I used this camera to take pictures and make a short film of myself doing silly things. I had to re-dub the sound, as the camera's microphone records poor quality sound.Do not let the camera's shortcomings discourage you from getting one, it is still a great camera and worth buying.So go get one. Now.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera, it is easy to use. Good deal for this product
Reviews.Author: Scarlet
Reviews.Content: this camera is very light and small it fits on purse.  Pictures come nice and clear.  Love the features of this camera

Reviews.Title: Great for Beginners or Intermediates!
Reviews.Author: K.Y.C
Reviews.Content: I got this camera last year at Best Buy for only seventy dollars (it was a Christmas sale)! Let me say that this is the best digital camera I've ever owned. It's small, easy to carry around, and if you know what you're doing-you can take some really professional shots with this! Granted, a simple digital camera does not match up to a real professional camera, but this one is pretty good.I've seen a few people complain about the battery life. Well, this is only a problem if you use the flash often. I almost never use the flash, and my battery will last me about a month before it needs charging. However, the more you use flash-the more it needs charging. Remember, flash takes up a pretty big chunk of battery life.Just like every other digital camera out there, this one does not come with a SD card; you'll have to buy one yourself. Thankfully, you can get them pretty cheap somewhere OTHER than Best Buy. I suggest either on Amazon or at Wal-Mart.If you're a beginner, then this camera is a great choice! You can set it to AUTO Mode if you don't know what you're doing; the camera will automatically choose the F Stop, flash, and try to make the picture as clear as possible. However, if you're an intermediate and know your way around a digital camera, then you can set everything manually and get some pretty nice shots. (To get the best shots I recommend picking the LARGEST photo size and the SUPER FINE quality. Yes, your pictures be huge files-but if you have photo editing software then you can re-size them without losing quality. Oh, and get a tripod as well-it really helps.)The only downside is that this camera is pretty slow when I connect it directly to my laptop. This would be a problem if I didn't have a SD Card Slot. It runs a lot faster and is easier to use than connecting the entire camera to a computer. If you have to pick between a USB port and a SD Card Slot-go with the SD Slot.All in all, this is a very nice camera for somebody who wants something with good quality, but doesn't want to spend a huge amount of money.

Reviews.Title: Only for close-ups.
Reviews.Author: Crusadergurl
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it was new on the market. At first I really liked it. I took a few close-up images and man they were amazing! Truly spectacular! .... And then I started taking group photos, outings, parties. Pictures taken outside are awful. I hate it and am so disappointed in Samsung. I tried different settings, aperature, everything. To most people they probably wouldn't care, but I'm extremely picky. My first camera was a Fuji, before they were Finepix, it was 5MP and took amazing photos. This one, which is 12MP, is easily worse. On the camera they look relatively okay, but when you load them on the computer and you can see the image better, you can see the lines aren't so sharp and in some photos there's almost a glare. Not really sure how to describe it. Buyer, please beware.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Michelle L. MacKinnon "Mikkilmack"
Reviews.Content: Required to purchase a camera for my job as a building manager I set out to get one that won't break the bank. Found this on sale a few months ago at Best Buy. To be honest I just wanted cheap and easy. Have been pleasantly surprised at the great pictures this takes especially in low lighting. With a quick change to the setting I can snap a picture in a room with barely any light and it looks like a sunny daylight picture. Simple to load up to PC with a simple cord that came with it and it charges at the same time while I go through the pictures. Really good zoom fixture, plus a "shake hand" fixture which is perfect for me. Best fixture is being able to choose the size of pics, one especially for use online versus same size for all. Would recommend this to everyone looking for a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but don't drop it too many times!! :(
Reviews.Author: mirrr
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for over a year now, and I love it!! Unfortunately, after a recent trip to Chico my poor little camera took a pretty hard fall to the face. Now the lens won't open :( Keep in mind this is probably the 20th time I've dropped it and it just now stopped working. I am seriously considering getting the same exact camera in a different color for my replacement. Here's my breakdown:Pros:-Quality, clear pictures-Beauty shot mode - my favorite feature! Beauty shot "perfects" your skin, making close-up pictures flawless- "Auto" will automatically choose the best settings for whatever picture you are taking-Tons of different options such as sunset, beach, nighttime, firework (although I've tested the firework setting and it's not the greatest!)-Pretty cute and compact, fits in my pocket-Price (got it for 100 bucks at best buy, looks about the same price on here)Cons:-Doesn't come with a memory card, and until you buy one it will only store ONE picture-When it's on the "beauty shot" mode, it takes a LONG time for the picture to show up - will say "Processing" for at least 30secs-1 minute..uncomfortable when you take a picture and they want to see it right away, you have to wait quite a while for it to come out!-Another con of the "beauty shot" mode is that if you aren't taking a close up picture, it comes out very blurry. You also have to hold it steady for a few seconds AFTER the flash to ensure it comes out clear.Battery life is pretty good. Not the greatest, but not annoyingly short either. Charger is short and easy to carry around, just plugs into the wall. Zoom is the same, enough zoom to work fine for me!Overall the pros outweigh the cons by far, and I absolutely love this camera. perfect for first time digital camera users or anyone who doesn't wanna spend bank on a camera! :)

Reviews.Title: good overall
Reviews.Author: Edmond Ramirez "eddy3735"
Reviews.Content: this is a nice camera, it takes wonderful pictures and has 5X optical zoom which is a great deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: My cell phone takes better pics (Samsung Epic)
Reviews.Author: Bellabuys
Reviews.Content: It's a pretty camera at a really cheap price but none of the pictures I've taken with this camera have been frame worthy.  It takes to long to change the settings and most of the pictures come out blurred.  Works best with outdoor lighting.  One good feature it does have is the color settings for after you've taken a pic. Gives it a nice touch.  I let my 6 year old keep this camera.

Reviews.Title: Meh. Not thrilled.
Reviews.Author: L. Stutts
Reviews.Content: I killed my previous camera (an older Fuji Finepix S3000) with an unfortunate baptism with hot cocoa. Well and truly dead. Forever. Lucky me, it happened right before Thanksgiving so I capitalized on Black Friday or Cyber Monday or something to latch onto a new camera.The specs on this Samsung  were better than my previous Fuji. The picture quality is worse though. I have not yet gotten any satisfying pictures after 2 whole months of adjusting things, If everything holds still, and you have the anti-shake on and the pic quality is maxed... then I get acceptable (but not great) pictures. The default setting straight out of the box is really poor quality. This camera is terrible at action shots. Even with the ISO adjustments. I am pretty disappointed.This camera struggles with low light and action shots. I get very few usable pix unless it has very bright light and a motionless subject. Good pix if both those conditions are met.It is a nice size and easy to intuit the menus. The LCD screen is large and clear. Using this camera is easy. The battery lasts and lasts. In fact, I have only charged it the one time when I got it. It feels solid and seems to be made well. Shutter lag is a bit slow, but still faster than my old camera.The seller (Beach Camera) was really, really  slow, but I am not factoring that into this review.So I guess I am in the market for another camera. One that is a bit better with capturing something other than still shots.Edited 12-2011 to add:I have still been unable to get decent motion or low light shots with this camera. Specifically, inside the school gymnasium (which is apparently a black hole, photographically speaking). However... I can use the same camera, in the same light and get decent video from it. I can actually record wrestling matches from up in the stands and have them turn out just fine.  This is a pocket-size video gizmo that works pretty darn well. I am very surprised since I fought trying to get pix with it for so long. Battery life is amazing, too. Just remember you can't zoom while shooting video so get all zoomed up first them just push the button and record the video. Easy-peasy.

Reviews.Title: Overall: pretty alright
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a gift for Christmas this year.  I love photography and have a bigger camera that takes great shots, but is annoying to carry around if I just want to take pictures with friends and such.  Since I was used to canon it took me a couple minutes to get situated to the set up of the camera, but once I figured everything out, it works wonderfully.  The pictures come out great, not high quality but you can't expect that from a small digital camera.  For a teenager, this camera satisfied my needs.  But if you're an adult looking for a more permanent camera, I would advise sticking with Canon.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY FROM THIS PERSON!!!!
Reviews.Author: tyra36
Reviews.Content: THIS WOMAN IS SUCH A CROOK. I ORDER THE CAMERA .. IT TAKES 2 WEEKS TO RECIEVE... SO IM THINKIN OK... NOTHING SO I BOUGHT A NEW ONE.... SO WHEN SHE TOOK THE MONEY OUT IT PUT MY BANK ACCOUNT IN THE RED ... AND AT THIS POINT IT WAS TWO WEEKS BEFORE MY CHECK... SO YOU ALREADY KNOW WHAT HAPPEN RIGHT????? DIDNT EVEN HAVE THE BALLS TO WRITE ME BACK ABOUT A REFUND ... HERES THE FUNNY PART I GET THE CAM ERA AND ITS JUST THE CAMERA NOTHING WITH IT .. THE CD TO PUT THE PRODUCT ON  MY COMPUTER THE CORDS THAT IT COME WITH... AND ON TOP OF THAT SHE WRAPPED IT LIKE A 4 YEAR OLD SENT ME THE CAMERA.. IT WAS IN A UGLY BROWN PAPERBAG, OPENED THE BOOKS THE CAMERA WAS IN THE BOXS NOT WRAP WITH 3 PLASTIC BAGS ... UNREAL.... THIS PERSON IS NOT A GOOD PERSON.. WHO DOES THAT WITHOUT A RESPONED ...

Reviews.Title: Very portable camera with low image quality.
Reviews.Author: Shomu Banerjee
Reviews.Content: This camera is pretty durable, and it's small enough that It'll fit in a pocket. It's got just enough zoom for a camera its size, and the flash is OK.However, the battery door is EXTREMELY fragile, and can become undone very easily. In addition, image and video quality is really poor.As long a you're not trying to make high-quality prints at a size over 4x6, it ought to be fine. However, it's a very basic camera, and does not offer any real customizable settings which are present on other brand-name cameras.Overall, it's OK for the money, but you can do better.

Reviews.Title: Don't expect a lot for this price
Reviews.Author: Dr Moreau
Reviews.Content: Will it take snapshots of things for you? Sure.Will it take actually GOOD looking pictures? No.To put it simply pictures are very soft, very grainy, and often out of focus. I bought this so I wouldn't have to carry around my DSLR anymore, and I wasn't expecting SLR quality results, but this thing isn't even as good as the previous Casio point & shoot I had which took very clear and crisp shots.

Reviews.Title: terrible camera
Reviews.Author: Riksha
Reviews.Content: I purchased this poor excuse for a camera from Best Buy at the end of October 2010.  I have been trying for two weeks to return this lackluster camera to either Best Buy (they do not even respond) or to Samsung.  Neither company will discuss a refund of this product.  I have decided to never purchase from Best Buy again and I will not purchase any Samsung products.  The camera takes very blurry pictures in dim light situations.  I have since purchased a Cannon camera from Sams Club and I am very happy with that purchase.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY THIS CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: kris10ew
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera over a month ago as a Christmas present.  As soon as I got it I took it out to make sure it worked and it would not charge.  I contacted the seller and was told to contact Samsung.  After a month of fighting with Samsung and being told twice a usb cable is being sent to me I still have not received one.  So my sister has yet to be able to use this camera and it was her "big" Christmas present.  I called Samsung today and they told me all they could do was request it again and it would be 10-14 business days.  I asked if they could at least speed up the shipping and they told me no.  I decided to just return the camera but the seller only has a 14 day return policy.  Apparently I am just out $80 and am going to have to buy my sister another camera.

Reviews.Title: Memory card
Reviews.Author: amrinder
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera from Bestbuy like 15 minutes back. As  speak it is getting charged :). cant wait to use itCan someone tell me which is the right memory card for this cam. I searched amazon and Transcend 4 GB Class 6 SDHC Flash Memory Card TS4GSDHC6E looks good. so does Kingston 4 GB Class 4 SDHC Flash Memory Card SD4/4GBI know class 6 is faster but is this camera compatible?

ProductInfo.Features:
5x, 27-135mm equivalent wide-angle lens
Anti-scratch Mask and rubberized construction around buttons, on bottom and around LCD display for durability
Smart Night Mode for superb photos in low-light situations
Digital Image Stabilization helps prevent blurry photos at slower shutter speeds
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SL605 12.2 MP Digital Camera with 5X Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD Screen (Blue)
